description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 05 June 2020 (RN: 19/08751/FULL) for, 'Erection of rear extensions at second, third and fourth floor levels to incorporate a new lift; demolition of existing mansard roof and erection of replacement mansard; demolition and replacement of rear courtyard floor slab; installation of air conditioning units at roof level and under pavement basement vaults; demolition and rebuild of two chimney stacks on the mews; replacement of windows on all elevations of the main house, demolition and re-building of rear ground floor toilet annexe, and associated internal and external works'; NAMELY, to allow the reduction in width of the consented new southern rear windows on the second, third and fourth floors; amendment to consented rear walk on roof light panes in courtyard to align glazing bars with door openings above; addition of wall lights either side of front light well basement entrance door; addition of security cameras on the front and rear ground floor elevations; installation of an intercom to the right of the main entrance door; new handrail and balusters to staircase between second and fourth floor; and various internal alterations to all floors, landscaping works to the rear courtyard comprising rendering; stone paving; installation of light fixtures and installation of trellis panels.
